nodes.text: The Ministry of State was one of the senior ministries of the Rebel Alliance and the New Republic. Headed by the Minister of State, the Ministry of State served as the foreign affairs branch of the General Ministry, attending to the bureaucratic needs of new member states, as well as diplomatic relations with non-member states and nations, which could range from single colonized moons to whole populated star clusters.
The Ministry of State also possessed a few internal duties.
